amendment.description: An amendment numbered 43 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to provide grants to states to encourage involvement of minors in election activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Beyer.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
